rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A small foyer with a north-facing entrance that adheres to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with Bohemian decor and natural textures; ideal for family gatherings. Includes a cozy seating area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed to host meals and casual get-togethers.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with a Bohemian twist using natural materials and open shelving; includes prep area and dining nook.

openings.description: Provides an inviting entrance, in line with Vastu for wealth and positive energy.
Large windows to allow ample natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious and airy room with Bohemian decor, private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for children or guests, designed with natural light in mind.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space maintaining the Bohemian theme.

openings.description: Adequate windows to ensure proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Balanced bedroom with Bohemian accents and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional room space for privacy or extra living space.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: Compact area designed for work or study with a comfortable desk setup.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Compact yet effective gym space designed with minimal equipment and a Bohemian aesthetic. Emphasizes natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility
rooms.description: Space for storage of personal items or additional gym equipment if needed.

openings.description: Ensuring bright and airy workout space.
